price: Ô les croyants ! Craignez Allah, et cherchez le moyen  de vous rapprocher de Lui et luttez pour Sa cause. Peut-être serez-vous de ceux qui réussissent !
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱبۡتَغُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ ٱلۡوَسِيلَةَ وَجَٰهِدُواْ فِي سَبِيلِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
footnotes: [248] Le moyen: la piété et les bonnes œuvres.

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wa-ib'taghū ilayhi al-wasīlata wajāhidū fī sabīlihi laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
